objects.finish: Shiny, reflective finish on shelves and metallic stars, matte finish on wooden elements

features: White background with multicolored polka dots
Velvet-like finish on the top part

objects.finish: Matte finish on desk and shiny finish on metal legs
Glossy finish on plastic, soft fabric texture on cushion

colors: White, orange, beige, green, multicolored polka dots, floral pattern
visual_attributes.lighting: Natural light coming from the window, additional light from a desk lamp

indian_context.regional_style: Modern Indian with influences from traditional elements
traditional_elements: Polka dot pattern (inspired by traditional Indian fabrics)
Rabbit-shaped bed frame (modern adaptation of traditional furniture designs)
modern_adaptations: Use of contemporary materials (fabric for seating, metal for desk legs)
indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of space with built-in shelves and a desk integrated into the wall
indian_context.cultural_significance: The polka dot pattern and the floral bedding reflect traditional Indian textiles, while the modern rabbit-shaped bed frame adds a playful and contemporary touch

analysis.description: This modern Indian bedroom features a playful and contemporary design with a rabbit-shaped bed frame, a desk integrated into the wall, and built-in shelves with star decorations. The room incorporates traditional Indian elements like the polka dot pattern and floral bedding in a contemporary context. The use of wood, metal, and fabric reflects a blend of traditional and modern materials, creating a visually appealing and functional space.

metadata.indian_specific: Polka dot pattern, floral bedding, built-in shelves with star decorations
